topics.body: Does anyone else remember that two minute cartoon that used to air on Boomerang of a guy who turned into a car/motorcycle/something ass first and save his "girlfriend" from danger only to transform back just in time for aid girlfriend to quip "Gee, you missed that car again!" or was ten year old me hallucinating?

In fact the only reason I remember this is because Robot Chicken Made fun of it!

Oh shit, I remember Speed Buggy. Just one of many uncanny Scooby Doo ripoffs.

You know, this brings up a very good point...what charm did Scooby Doo have that its ripoffs didn't? I mean, it's a very basic idea.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body: Let's imagine for a moment that you were an amputee. If you had to choose between getting a grown organic leg or a cybernetic prosthesis, which would you choose?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54efa3aa6368720d3cab3300#post_54efa3aa6368720d3cab3300
I don't know. Maybe it's just that scooby came first and had more effort put into it. Or maybe people just got tired of the formula. 

Also The best part is that they were all hy Hanna barbera. Even scooby doo. They ripped themselves off.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54efa3c66368725c10100800#post_54efa3c66368725c10100800
That's a tough choise to make.

With Cybernetics you get a cool Raiden leg. And maybe be able to kick through shit and all that. 

With Organics you probably will get your actual leg back but thousands times better.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54efa3c66368725c10100800#post_54efa3c66368725c10100800
